message.content:
```json
{
  "module_name": "PasswordGenerator",
  "reviewed_prompt": "Design a software module that generates random passwords with customizable options. The module should allow users to specify the length of the password and whether to include special characters. The generated passwords should be secure and meet common security standards. The module should be flexible enough to integrate into various systems where password generation is required.",
  "functional_details": [
    "Generate random passwords based on user-defined criteria.",
    "Allow users to specify the length of the password.",
    "Provide an option to include or exclude special characters in the password.",
    "Ensure the generated passwords are secure and meet common security standards.",
    "Support integration into various systems."
  ],
  "user_interaction": [
    "User specifies the desired length of the password.",
    "User chooses whether to include special characters.",
    "User receives the generated password."
  ],
  "minimum_features": [
    "Generate random passwords of specified length.",
    "Option to include or exclude special characters.",
    "Basic security checks to ensure password strength."
  ],
  "desired_features": [
    "Option to include or exclude numbers.",
    "Option to include or exclude uppercase letters.",
    "Option to include or exclude lowercase letters.",
    "Password strength indicator.",
    "History of generated passwords."
  ],
  "bar_raiser_features": [
    "Customizable character sets for password generation.",
    "Support for generating passphrases.",
    "Integration with password managers.",
    "Multi-language support for special characters."
  ],
  "data_models": [
    "**PasswordCriteria**: { length: integer, include_special_chars: boolean, include_numbers: boolean, include_uppercase: boolean, include_lowercase: boolean }",
    "**GeneratedPassword**: { password: string, strength: string, timestamp: datetime }",
    "**PasswordHistory**: { passwords: array<GeneratedPassword>, user_id: string }"
  ]
}
```
